attributes.action: Do not make British Citizens subject to foreign laws.
attributes.additional_details:
It is intolerable that a foreign nation can reach into our borders with their laws and, through legal extradition, snatch up a British Citizen for breaking their them.

We, the undersigned call upon the British government to enshrine in law our natural right that any British Citizen who stands on British soil shall be subject exclusively to British law, even if those acts have consequences, real or perceived, in a foreign nation.
